author: KC Archana
title: Good News! Bengaluru Doctor Claims To Be Close To Finding Cure For COVID-19
description: Click here to read about  Bengaluru based doctor claims to have developed an effective treatment for coronavirus which could be ready for trials by this weekend.
content:
COVID-19, the respiratory disease caused by the new coronavirus, has spread to every continent except Antarctica. While there is still no vaccine for the coronavirus that causes COVID-19, scientists across the world are working to develop one.
